card.name: Abyssal Gatekeeper
card.property: When Abyssal Gatekeeper dies, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are two ways for me to pass this gate. One involves you remaining conscious." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Abyssal Specter
card.property: Flying Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To gaze under its hood is to invite death.

card.name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
card.property: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wrath is no vice when inflicted upon the deserving."

card.name: Angel of Mercy
card.property: Flying When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every tear shed is a drop of immortality.

card.name: Angel's Feather
card.property: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If taken, it cuts the hand that clutches it. If given, it heals the hand that holds it.

card.name: Angelic Benediction
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even in single combat, I am never alone." —Rafiq of the Many

card.name: Angelic Page
card.property: Flying {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

card.name: Angelic Protector
card.property: Flying Whenever Angelic Protector becomes the target of a spell or ability, Angelic Protector gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My family sheltered in her light, the dark was content to wait." —Crovax

card.name: Angelsong
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Clash of sword and cry of beast fall mute when angels sound the call to prayer.

card.name: Barren Moor
card.property: Barren Moor enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Barter in Blood
card.property: Each player sacrifices two creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the game of conquest, who cares about the pawns if the king yet reigns?" —Geth, keeper of the Vault

card.name: Breeding Pit
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Breeding Pit unless you pay {B}{B}. At the beginning of your end step, create a 0/1 black Thrull creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The thrulls bred at a terrifying pace. In the end, they overwhelmed the Order of the Ebon Hand.

card.name: Cackling Imp
card.property: Flying {T}: Target player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its laughter drives needles through your mind.

card.name: Charging Paladin
card.property: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hope shall be the blade that severs our bonds."

card.name: Consume Spirit
card.property: Spend only black mana on X. Consume Spirit deals X damage to any target and you gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your blood, your marrow, your spirit—all are mine." —Mayvar, minion of Geth

card.name: Corrupt
card.property: Corrupt deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are things beneath the murk for whom the bog is a stew, a thin broth in need of meat.

card.name: Cruel Edict
card.property: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Choose your next words carefully. They will be your last." —Phage the Untouchable

card.name: Daggerclaw Imp
card.property: Flying Daggerclaw Imp can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Simic use the claws as scalpels, while the Rakdos use them for tattooing and torture. The Gruul use them to pick their teeth after lunching on the rest of the carcass.

card.name: Dark Banishing
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ha, banishment? Be merciful, say 'death,' For exile hath more terror in his look, Much more than death." —William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.property: Add {B}{B}{B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Leshrac, my liege, grant me the power I am due." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Demon's Horn
card.property: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its curve mimics the twists of life and death.

card.name: Demon's Jester
card.property: Flying Hellbent — Demon's Jester gets +2/+1 as long as you have no cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They knock 'em dead, with or without the punch line.

card.name: Demonic Tutor
card.property: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana learned the secrets she sought, but at a price that was etched on her fate.

card.name: Duress
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Change your mind, or I'll change it for you."

card.name: Dusk Imp
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Imps are just intelligent enough to have an understanding of cruelty.

card.name: Faith's Fetters
card.property: Enchant permanent When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. Enchanted permanent's activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities. If enchanted permanent is a creature, it can't attack or block.

card.name: Fallen Angel
card.property: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do you weep for the dead? I rejoice, for they have died for me."

card.name: Foul Imp
card.property: Flying When Foul Imp enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The imp, unaware of its own odor, paused to catch its breath . . . and promptly died.

card.name: Healing Salve
card.property: Choose one — • Target player gains 3 life. • Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

card.name: Icatian Priest

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grelden knelt and felt the cool, dry hand of the priest on his brow. Hours later, when his wits returned, he was covered in his enemies' blood on the field of victory.

card.name: Kuro, Pitlord
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Kuro, Pitlord unless you pay {B}{B}{B}{B}. Pay 1 life: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Lord of the Pit
card.property: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Lord of the Pit. If you can't, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you.

card.name: Luminous Angel
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The spread of evil's destruction shall always be matched by the rise of the noble fallen."

card.name: Marble Diamond
card.property: Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}.

card.name: Oni Possession
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample. Enchanted creature is a Demon Spirit.

card.name: Otherworldly Journey
card.property: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The landscape shimmered and I felt a chill breeze. When my vision cleared, I found myself alone among the corpses of my fallen friends." —Journal found in Numai

card.name: Overeager Apprentice
card.property: Discard a card, Sacrifice Overeager Apprentice: Add {B}{B}{B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slow and steady may not always win the race, but at least it doesn't end up splattered on the walls.

card.name: Pacifism
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even those born to battle could only lay their blades at Akroma's feet.

card.name: Promise of Power
card.property: Choose one — • You draw five cards and you lose 5 life. • Create an X/X black Demon creature token with flying, where X is the number of cards in your hand. Entwine {4} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Reiver Demon
card.property: Flying When Reiver Demon enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, destroy all nonartifact, nonblack creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Reya Dawnbringer
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have not died until I consent."

card.name: Righteous Cause
card.property: Whenever a creature attacks, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Until the world unites in vengeful fury and Phage is destroyed, I will not stay my hand." —Akroma, angelic avenger

card.name: Secluded Steppe
card.property: Secluded Steppe enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}. Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Serra Advocate
card.property: Flying {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An angel's blessing prepares a soldier for war better than a thousand military drills.

card.name: Serra Angel
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.

card.name: Serra's Boon
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 as long as it's white. Otherwise, it gets -2/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The light of an angel's glance is warm, but her fixed stare blinds and burns." —Calexis, deacon of the New Order of Serra

card.name: Serra's Embrace
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The touch of Serra's angels bears hopes aloft and empowers noble causes.

card.name: Soot Imp
card.property: Flying Whenever a player casts a nonblack spell, that player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If one gets in your chimney, you're going to need a long wick and a barrel of bangstuff to get it out." —Hob Heddil

card.name: Souldrinker
card.property: Pay 3 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Souldrinker.

card.name: Stinkweed Imp
card.property: Flying Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly five cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Sustainer of the Realm
card.property: Flying Whenever Sustainer of the Realm blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You may break her shield, but you'll never break her spirit.

card.name: Twilight Shepherd
card.property: Flying, vigilance When Twilight Shepherd enters the battlefield, return to your hand all cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Unholy Strength
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Such power grows the body as it shrinks the soul.

card.name: Venerable Monk
card.property: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Age wears the flesh but galvanizes the soul.
